title: Spicy lentil quinoa curry
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '150g diced onion', '75g chopped mushrooms', '75g chopped carrots', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 litre vegetable stock', '250ml water', '200g green lentils', '85g quinoa', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '2 tablespoons curry powder', '1 tablespoon chilli powder', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '1 tablespoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon garam masala', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '1 pinch freshly ground black pepper, or to taste', '60ml cream or milk', '1 tablespoon butter']
